sentences.en: a physical explanation for this phenomenon
sentences.cn: 对这一现象合乎自然规律的解释

sentences.en: Character is not separable from physical form but is governed by it.
sentences.cn: 性格和外表是分不开的，而且观其形知其性。

sentences.en: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.cn: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.en: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
sentences.cn: 他对健身着了迷。

sentences.en: He was out of work owing to a physical injury.
sentences.cn: 他因为受伤而失业了。

sentences.en: His love for her was not just physical attraction.
sentences.cn: 他对她的爱慕不只是肉体的吸引。

sentences.en: His reaction was as much of a rebuff as a physical recoil.
sentences.cn: 他的反应既是身体的退缩，也是一种断然的拒绝。

sentences.en: It's more than his physical stature that makes him remarkable.
sentences.cn: 他的与众不同之处不光是他的身高。

sentences.en: My idea of physical perfection is to be very slender.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，要拥有完美身材就要非常苗条。

sentences.en: Over-use of those drugs, coupled with poor diet, leads to physical degeneration.
sentences.cn: 过量使用那些药物再加上饮食缺乏营养，导致健康状况恶化。

sentences.en: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.cn: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.en: Physical and ideological barriers had come down in Eastern Europe.
sentences.cn: 物质和意识形态上的障碍在东欧已不复存在。

sentences.en: physical chemistry
sentences.cn: 物理化学

sentences.en: Physical perfection in a human being is exceedingly rare.
sentences.cn: 体貌完美的人极为罕见。

sentences.en: Poor housing and family stress can affect both physical and mental health.
sentences.cn: 住房条件差、家庭压力大会影响身心两方面的健康。

sentences.en: She is a very physical young woman, earthy, and very intense.
sentences.cn: 她是个很粗犷的年轻女子，快人快语，非常热情。

sentences.en: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.cn: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.en: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.cn: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.en: The physical benefits of exercise can be divided into three factors.
sentences.cn: 运动对身体的好处可以分为3个方面。

sentences.en: the physical environment
sentences.cn: 客观环境

sentences.en: the physical world around us
sentences.cn: 我们周遭的物质世界

sentences.en: The sheer physical effort had exacted a heavy price.
sentences.cn: 纯粹的体力劳动已经产生了极其不利的影响。

sentences.en: The subhuman conditions of work soon caused physical deterioration.
sentences.cn: 非人的工作环境不久就导致了身体状况的恶化。

sentences.en: They were kept in appalling physical conditions.
sentences.cn: 他们被关押的环境极其恶劣。

sentences.en: We decided that in the game we would be physical and aggressive.
sentences.cn: 我们决定在比赛中积极拼抢，大胆进攻。

words.tran_cn: 身体的,肉体的,物质的,真正的,可见的

phrases.tran_cn: 身体活动，体育活动；体力活动
身体状况；实际条件；物理状态
物理环境，实体环境；自然环境
身体健康；体力；身体适宜性
n. 体育；体能训练；身体训练

trans.tran_cn: 身体的，物质的，符合自然规律的，外部的，物理学的，喜欢动手动脚的，肉体的，粗暴的
trans.tran_en: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions
a thorough examination of someone’s body by a doctor, in order to discover whether they are healthy or have any illnesses or medical problems
